sn20.2:4.2: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn20.2:4.3: “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo cāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito yā cāyaṃ mahāpathavī”ti?
sn20.2:4.5: Appamattakoyaṃ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
sn20.2:4.6: Saṅkhampi na upeti upanidhimpi na upeti kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
sn20.2:4.7: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn20.2:4.8: atha kho eteyeva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
